nodes.text: Jason Cosler is a senior manager and producer who specializes in content development at LEGO. He worked as a Producer on the 2016 and 2017 animated television series LEGO Star Wars: The Freemaker Adventures, the 2018 series LEGO Star Wars: All-Stars and was an Executive Producer on the 2020 LEGO Star Wars Holiday Special.

Cosler has also produced previous LEGO animated content including LEGO Marvel Super Heroes Avengers Reassembled, LEGO Marvel Spider-Man: Vexed by Venom, LEGO Marvel Avengers: Climate Conundrum, LEGO Jurassic World: Legend of Isla Nublar, the LEGO DC Comics Superheroes film franchise and many others.
